titleStmt.title: The su[m] of diuinitie drawn out of the holy scripture very necessary, not only for curates [et] yong studentes in diuinitie: but also for al christen men and women what soeuer age they be of. Drawn out of Latine into Englyshe by Robert Hutten.
Margarita theologica. English.
titleStmt.author: Spangenberg, Johann.
Hutton, Robert, d. 1568.
Turner, William, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By John Day and Wyllyam Seres, dwellynge in Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a litle aboue Holbourne Conduite],

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Robert Hutton, of: Spangenberg, Johann. Margarita theologica.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
